title: Turn off skin border ?
body:
Hey guys,
i have the Championship Ashe Skin and i want the Icon from the Event / quests. Is there any way to not use a skin border like the new one or those from the project skins ?

replies.body: The only way to get rid of those borders is to actually *remove* the icon associated with it. If you'd like, we can remove that icon which will disable the border, but you'll need to hit up our EU agents in a ticket!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3nlpFPt8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-25T02:18:14.330+0000)
>
> The only way to get rid of those borders is to actually *remove* the icon associated with it. If you'd like, we can remove that icon which will disable the border, but you'll need to hit up our EU agents in a ticket!

I have the same question. I like the icons, but not the borders. So to clarify "remove," you mean remove it from the account altogether?
